question: You need to borrow some money to pay for something you need for your work or studies. Write a letter to your bank to ask for a loan. In your letterintroduce yourself and ask for a loansay why you need the moneyexplain how you plan to pay the money back
text: Hope my letter finds you well.
I am Ruth Giron, one of your customers in one of your branches in the Downtown area. Please be informed that I have a savings account in your bank. I am writing this letter to apply for a loan.

Kindly note that one of my nephews will be graduating from high school this coming November, thus, I need money to support  her tuition fee in college. My salary is not enough to provide for her needs since I still have some obligations that I need to budget. I believe my reason is enough to grant and process my request.

I suggested that you can directly deduct the monthly amortization of my loan to my personal savings account. Should you have any concerns regarding my application, please do not hesitate to contact me on my mobile number.
Looking forward to hearing from you.
